name: txt_&
desc: &: Joins multiple conditions, subjects or objects together in a rule. Can also be spelled as ampersand with letters. Rules with stacked text or n't and &s don't work like in baba, be sure to experiment!

name: txt_txt
desc: TXT: An object class referring to all text objects, or just a specific one if you write e.g. BAB TXT BE GAY.

name: txt_nt
desc: N'T: A suffix that negates the meaning of a verb, condition or object class. X txtn't will refer to all txt except that one.

name: txt_infloop
desc: INFLOOP: A special word that describes the infinite loop state.

name: txt_plsdont
desc:
PLSDONT: Like infloop, but for plsdonts instead. Keep in mind that some plsdonts occur before the first round of rule parsing completes, and so plsdont rules won't apply then.
Two basic plsdonts are 1000 rules formed; 3000 objects ever existed.

name: txt_...
desc: ... (ELLIPSIS): Extends rules. BAB ... BE ... ... U is the same as BAB BE U.

name: txt_''
desc: DITTO: Acts like the text above it. " TXT will refer to the ditto itself, not the text above it.

name: txt_frens
desc: FRENS: A group you can be a member of. 'x BE FRENS' adds you to the FRENS group. 'FRENS BE x' applies the property to all FRENS.

name: txt_groop
desc: GROOP: A variant of FRENS.

name: txt_gang
desc: GANG: A variant of FRENS but members wear an exclusive hat. Put an object before it to make unique gangs!

name: txt_sharp
desc: For use with SING.

name: txt_flat
desc: For use with SING.

name: txt_every1
desc: EVERY1: Every object type in the level, aside from special objects like TXT, NO1, LVL, BORDR, and MOUS.

name: txt_every2
desc:
EVERY2: every1 + txt + innerlvl.
A few other edge cases might be added in the future, but bordr, no1, and mous being excluded are intentional.

name: txt_every3
desc: EVERY3: Absolutely everything conceivable. The pinnacle of everything technology.

name: txt_samefloat
desc:
SAMEFLOAT( (Compare Condition): True if the condition unit has the same amount of FLYE as the target.
Anti: a = -b

name: txt_samepaint
desc:
SAMEPAINT (Compare Condition): True if the condition unit is the same color as the target. Also, BAB BE SAMEPAINT KEEK will turn bab into a keek of the same color that bab was.
Anti: opposite color (see color descs to see what's considered opposite)

name: txt_sameface
desc:
SAMEFACE (Compare Condition): True if the condition unit is facing the same direction as the target.
Anti: opposite direction

name: txt_themself
desc: THEMSELF: Refers to the subject of the rule - uses correct pronouns!

name: txt_anti
desc:
ANTI: Inverses the word after it to do the opposite. Does not work with nouns.
Each text has a custom effect when anti'd. "mirror" in verbs means x verb y becomes y verb x. Conditions without anything specified just have the result inverted (a la n't).

name: txt_c_sharp
desc: For use with SING.

name: txt_d_sharp
desc: For use with SING.

name: txt_f_sharp
desc: For use with SING.

name: txt_g_sharp
desc: For use with SING.

name: txt_a_sharp
desc: For use with SING.

name: txt_toen
desc: TOEN: Refers to all music note letters that exist in the level.

name: txt_lethers
desc: LETHERS: Refers to all letters that exist in the level.

name: txt_yuiy
desc: YUIY: Refers to all UIs that exist in the level.

name: txt_numa
desc:
NUMA: Refers to all numbers that exist in the level.

NUMA n't refers to all non-number letters.

name: txt_gravy
desc: GRAVY: Changes the direction of HAET SKYE and HAET FLOR. (Unimplemented)

name: txt_gaem
desc:
GAEM: refers to either the game window or the level that your in.
GAEM BE NOUN switches to a level with just that object.

name: txt_pathz
desc: PATHZ: A variant of FRENS for selectr.

name: txt_and
desc: AND: Joins multiple conditions, subjects or objects together in a rule.

name: txt_andn't
desc: AND NOT: The same as having these two text tiles in a row.

name: txt_not
desc: NOT: A suffix that negates the meaning of a verb, condition or object class. X txt not will refer to all txt except that one.

name: txt_groop2
desc: GROOP2: A variant of FRENS.

name: txt_groop3
desc: GROOP3: A variant of FRENS.

name: txt_groop4
desc: GROOP4: A variant of FRENS.

name: txt_groop5
desc: GROOP5: A variant of FRENS.

name: txt_groop6
desc: GROOP6: A variant of FRENS.

name: txt_halfu
desc:
U: Controlled by you, the player!
Anti: opposite direction

name: txt_halfnogo
desc:
NO GO: Can't be entered by objects. Overrides GO AWAY PLS!
Anti: icyyyy
